data.communicativeGoal: So you can publish reliable decks that hydrate in the Sandbox runtime.

data.title: Sandbox architecture overview
data.context: The Sandbox pairs the Activity Builder shell, deck runtime helpers, layout defaults, slide navigation, and shared CSS and theme bundles to deliver accessible authoring from plan to export.
data.essentialQuestion: How do these components and archetypes combine to deliver consistent slides?

data.title: What each module provides
data.description: Review how every core file sustains authoring and playback.

cards.title: Activity Builder shell
cards.description: Declares the builder interface, loads fonts and CSS, and serialises state for previews, exports, and deck hand-off.

cards.title: Deck runtime helpers
cards.description: Initialises the viewport, counters, editing affordances, asset search, and module overlays while lazy-loading navigation.

cards.title: Layout defaults
cards.description: Clones archetype data, normalises icon fallbacks, and merges slide overrides for consistent visuals.

cards.title: Navigator and theming
cards.description: Builds the accessible slide tray and shares CSS tokens for typography, spacing, colours, and surfaces.

data.title: Authoring workflow essentials
data.subtitle: Prompt-led pipeline
steps: Extract deck metadata, language, and asset cues from the lesson brief before drafting slides.
Map each pedagogical moment to a supported layout before populating fields.
Break prose into layout fields, arrays, notes, and multimedia references.
Validate colour directives, module payloads, and text budgets before returning the JSON brief.

data.title: Sandbox functionality knowledge check
data.instructions: Choose the best answer about Sandbox functionality.
data.rubric: Award one point per correct selection, then review rationales together.

questions.prompt: Which module seeds default JSON blueprints for Activity Builder previews?
questions.explanation: sandbox/activity-builder.js seeds the default module JSON so previews load with meaningful content.

questions.prompt: Which file merges archetype defaults into slide briefs?
questions.explanation: sandbox/slide-templates.js clones archetypes and normalises icon defaults before applying overrides.

questions.prompt: Which bundle defines the theme tokens shared across layouts?
questions.explanation: sandbox/sandbox-theme.css provides fonts, spacing, colour tokens, and other shared CSS custom properties.
